title: Create a Photo Gallery for a Website
description: A photo editor needs to create a web-based photo gallery from a recent event.

tasks.description: Select the best 20-30 photos from the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: A curated set of photos is chosen.

tasks.description: Resize and optimize the photos for fast loading on the web.
Upload the photos to the CMS and arrange them in a gallery format.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new photo gallery is created in the CMS.

tasks.description: Write a title and introduction for the gallery and publish it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The photo gallery is live on the website.
